name: change_playback_state
description: Changes the playback state of the currently playing media to 'STOP', 'PAUSE', or 'RESUME'.

target_state.description: The desired playback state for the media. It must be one of the following string values: `STOP`, `PAUSE`, or `RESUME`.

app_name.description: The optional name of the media application whose playback state will be changed.

name: dislike
description: Dislikes the currently playing media. Returns a dictionary containing the result of the action and details about the media item, such as its title and application name.

name: like
description: Likes the media item that is currently playing.

name: next
description: Skips to the next media item in the current playlist and returns information about the new item.

name: previous
description: Skips to the previous media item in the current playlist. This action will fail if already at the first item.

name: replay
description: Restarts the current media item from the beginning.

name: resume
description: Resumes playback of the currently paused media. This action requires an active media player.

name: seek_absolute
description: Jumps to an absolute position in the media, specified in seconds, and then resumes playback.

position.description: The absolute position to jump to within the media, specified as an integer in seconds.

name: seek_relative
description: Adjusts the media playback position by a specified duration relative to the current time, then resumes playing.

offset.description:
**Rewritten Description:**
The relative offset in seconds from the current playback position. A positive value fast forwards the media, while a negative value rewinds it.

name: stop
description: Stops the currently playing media on an active media player.
